channel.title: Runescape 2 web client help
channel.description:
I don't even know where to start, all the tutorials I could find were to do with downloaded versions not in-browser ones. If someone could just give me a link to an existing tutorial that shows how to produce your own web client that would be much help.
I also need instructions on how to have client connect to my servers IP.
Also What program do people use to edit java?
Thank you ahead of time. ;)
